item.title: IIIT Raichur Recruitment 2025: Apply before April 30 at iiitr.ac.in
item.description:
<![CDATA[Authored by : ET Now Digital Updated Apr 10, 2025 13:19 IST IIIT Raichur Recruitment 2025: IIIT Raichur invites applications for 07 faculty positions under Assistant Professor Grades I & II in Computer Science, AI & Data Science, and Mathematics & Computing. Apply by April 30, 2025.
IIIT Raichur Recruitment 2025: The IIIT The Indian Institute of Information Technology Raichur Raichur ) is seeking applications for the post of Assistant Professor in the regular positions in various fields. The in...]]>
